verses.text: Hear me when I call, O God of my righteousness: thou hast enlarged me when I wasin distress; have mercy upon me, and hear my prayer.
O ye sons of men, how long will ye turnmy glory into shame? how longwill ye love vanity, andseek after leasing? Selah.
But know that the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*hath set apart him that is godly for himself: the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*will hear when I call unto him.
Stand in awe, and sin not: commune with your own heart upon your bed, and be still. Selah.
Offer the sacrifices of righteousness, and put your trust in the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
There bemany that say, Who will shew us anygood? \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.
Thou hast put gladness in my heart, more than in the time thattheir corn and their wine increased.
I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, only makest me dwell in safety.
